title: SLIIT taken under the purview of Mahapola Trust Fund
content: The Government has decided to take over the Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology (SLIIT) in Malabe under the Mahapola Trust Fund. The Cabinet paper submitted by Minister of Trade Dr. Bandula Gunawardena was also approved yesterday. The Minister said that SLIIT, which was under the Mahapola Trust Fund, had been disposed of through various ordinances introduced by the previous government. Speaking in Parliament yesterday, he said that the Cabinet had approved the repeal of the ordinance and the transfer of SLIIT to the Mahapola Trust Fund. Meanwhile, the Mahapola Higher Education Scholarship Trust Fund Amendment Bill was also passed with amendments in Parliament yesterday.
